request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X GET --location "http://{{base_url}}/article/all" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json"

Generated from cURL: curl -X PUT --location "http://{{base_url}}/customer-service/{{problemId}}/reject" \
    -H "Authorization: {{customer_service_token}}" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json"

Generated from cURL: curl -X POST --location "http://{{base_url}}/admin/register" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -d '{
          "role": "ADMIN",
          "username": "admin",
          "password": "admin",
          "birthDate": "{{date}}"
        }'
